title: Verify Estimated Payments Were Applied
description: A client received a balance due notice, but they believe the IRS did not properly credit their estimated tax payments.

tasks.description: Request the client's IRS account transcript for the tax year in question.
Analyze the transcript to see all payments credited to the client's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the transaction list on the transcript.

tasks.description: Compare the transcript to the client's proof of payment (e.g., bank statements) and identify the missing payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that the 3rd quarter payment was not credited and prepares a response to the IRS with proof of payment.
